title: Watch Face ROAD
summary: Watch Face for all models smartwatches with support new screens (360dp).

description: Watch face for smartwatches with built-in Calendar, steps counter and battery level.But working fine on other oldest and newest models: LG G W100, R W110; Asus Zen Watch.Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.Configuration supported languages- English- Français- Deutsch- Українська- Русский- 中文 （繁體）Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face for smartwatches with built-in Calendar, steps counter and battery level.
But working fine on other oldest and newest models: LG G W100, R W110; Asus Zen Watch.
Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Українська
- Русский
- 中文 （繁體）

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
comments: Pretty nice.  Running on Android 8 Oreo OS phone, and on Tag Heuer Connected 45 watch... Seems to work ok.  But, weather shows +72 / 3.1 ?   I assume that is 72 degrees, is 3.1 the wind speed?  Also, should some apps launch, like Fit, to see details when I press screen?
Simple, very visible, sensible ambient mode, doesn't chew a lot battery, functional, very good for rectangular faces.
I like it only problem is i have to force update weather every time or i would rate 5 stars
Nice clean watch face useful information at a glance easy to see colors
recentChanges: - New "Weather" function, only forecast for 4 days.
Important: for working needed permission for "Location Service".
